wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Glendwr Palmer Owen (19 May 1859 – 20 October 1912) was an English cricketer. He played for Essex between 1882 and 1902.

response: * Sir Hugh Owen, 1st Baronet (1604–1670), Member of Parliament (MP) for Pembroke, Haverfordwest and Pembrokeshire
